GET /.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all users

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: gets the comments related to a specific article

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: adds a comment to a specific article

DELETE /api/articles/:article_id/comment.description: deletes a comment related to a specific article
